casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

June 3, 2011

[Cite as 06/03/2011 Case Announcements, 2011-Ohio-2674.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-1654. Sanderbeck v. Medina Cty.

Medina App. No. 09CA0051-M, 2010-Ohio-3659. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Medina County.

Upon consideration of appellees’ motion for leave to use a demonstrative exhibit during oral argument scheduled for June 8, 2011, it is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
